title: Approaching my 1000th win
body: I heard that riot games will play with you for your 1,000th win. Is this still a thing? If so, how would i go about doing that? I would love to get to play with riot, especially Sjokz <3

replies.body:
Not sure Sjokz is still in NA... but I can check that. 

But, I'd be willing to win a game with you... if you'll have me :3

Associate Gameplay Capture Artist ?_?

What does it eat for breakfast..?
Apple Slices with a bit of peanut butter and a cup of tea in an Anivia mug.
gameplay capture artist... is that like screenshots and videos?
Yeah! So if it's a video showcasing something in-game (Ability Videos, Champ Spotlights, Skin Spotlights, etc.) , that's my team and I capturing it.
when would you be able to play? ill be on for the rest of the night

Kinda.  If you ask someone, like Sjokz for example, they might be willing to play with you for a milestone.
It's kinda up to them, of course; employees have played with those who have asked before though.
